data.title: Hyperion
data.meta_description: Hyperion Solutions Corporation was acquired by Oracle Corporation in 2007. Many of its products were targeted at the Business Intelligence (BI) and Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) markets and, as of 2013, were developed and sold as Oracle Hyperion products.
data.text:
